10.ara-name: كتاب الجنائز عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abdullah bin Buraidah narrated from his father, that:The Prophet said: "The believer dies with sweat on his brow

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ أَنَّ الْمُؤْمِنَ يَمُوتُ بِعَرَقِ الْجَبِينِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Dying With Sweat On Ones Brow
